00011 #ifndef BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_REF_WRAPPER_CRTP_ER_MPG_2010_HPP
00012 #define BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_REF_WRAPPER_CRTP_ER_MPG_2010_HPP
00013 #include <boost/utility/enable_if.hpp>
00014 #include <boost/type_traits/is_same.hpp>
00015 #include <boost/type_traits/remove_const.hpp>
00016 #include <boost/type_traits/add_const.hpp>
00017 #include <boost/call_traits.hpp>
00018 #include <boost/operators.hpp>
00019 
00020 // This design is an outgrowth of assign_detail::assign_reference<> by TO. The 
00021 // new feature is that the assignment operator and swap member function are 
00022 // customizable and there are two options, identified by MPG : the 
00023 // reference is assigned a new value (copy), or a new address (rebind). 
00024 
00025 namespace boost{
00026 namespace assign{ 
00027 namespace v2{
00028 namespace ref{
00029     
00030     template<typename D, typename T>
00031     class wrapper_crtp 
00032     : 
00033         boost::less_than_comparable1< 
00034             wrapper_crtp<D,T>, 
00035             boost::less_than_comparable2<
00036                 wrapper_crtp<D,T>,
00037                 T,
00038                 boost::equality_comparable1<
00039                     wrapper_crtp<D,T>,
00040                     boost::equality_comparable2<
00041                         wrapper_crtp<D,T>,
00042                         T
00043                     >
00044                 >
00045             >
00046         >
00047     {
00048 
00049                 typedef typename boost::remove_const<T>::type lvalue_;
00050                 typedef typename boost::add_const<T>::type rvalue_;
00051 
00052         public: 
00053         // protected
00054 
00055         D& derived(){ return static_cast<D&>( *this ); }
00056         D const & derived()const{ return static_cast<D const&>( *this ); }
00057 
00058         public:
00059 
00060         void operator=(lvalue_& r ){ this->derived().assign( r ); }
00061                 void operator=(rvalue_& r ){ this->derived().assign( r ); }
00062 
00063         void swap( wrapper_crtp& r )
00064         {
00065             return this->derived().swap( r );
00066         }
00067 
00068         operator T&() const
00069         {
00070             return this->derived().unwrap();
00071         }
00072 
00073         bool operator==( const wrapper_crtp& r )const
00074         {
00075             return this->derived().unwrap() == r.derived().unwrap();
00076         }
00077 
00078         bool operator<( const wrapper_crtp& r )const
00079         {
00080             return this->derived().unwrap() < r.derived().unwrap();
00081         }
00082 
00083         bool operator==( typename boost::call_traits<T>::param_type r )const
00084         {
00085             return this->derived().unwrap() == r;
00086         }
00087 
00088         bool operator<( typename boost::call_traits<T>::param_type r )const
00089         {
00090             return this->derived().unwrap() < r;
00091         }
00092 
00093         bool operator>( typename boost::call_traits<T>::param_type r )const
00094         {
00095             return this->derived().unwrap() > r;
00096         }
00097         
00098 
00099     };
00100 
00101         template<typename D,typename T>
00102         void rebind( wrapper_crtp<D,T>& a, T& r ){ a.rebind( r ); }
00103 
00104     template<typename D,typename T>
00105     inline void swap( wrapper_crtp<D,T>& l, wrapper_crtp<D,T>& r )
00106     {
00107         l.swap( r );
00108     }
00109 
00110 namespace functional{
00111 
00112         template<typename T>
00113     struct assigner
00114     {
00115         assigner(T& val):value( val ){}
00116         
00117                 typedef typename boost::remove_const<T>::type lvalue_;
00118                 typedef typename boost::add_const<T>::type rvalue_;
00119         
00120         typedef void result_type;
00121         
00122         template<typename D> void operator()(wrapper_crtp<D, lvalue_>& w)const
00123         {
00124                         this->impl<D, lvalue_>( w );
00125                 }        
00126 
00127         template<typename D> void operator()(wrapper_crtp<D, rvalue_>& w)const
00128         {
00129                         this->impl<D, rvalue_>( w );
00130                 }        
00131 
00132         private:
00133                 template<typename D, typename U>        
00134         void impl(wrapper_crtp<D, U>& w)const
00135         {
00136                         w = this->value;
00137                 }        
00138         
00139         assigner();
00140         mutable T& value;
00141     };
00142 
00143 }// functional
00144 }// ref
00145 }// v2
00146 }// assign
00147 }// boost
00148 
00149 #endif
